FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our laptop marketplace
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does the laptop marketplace work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our marketplace connects buyers and sellers of laptops. Users can list their laptops for sale or browse available options to purchase. We ensure secure transactions and provide buyer protection.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Are the laptops new or used?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We offer both new and used laptops. Each listing clearly states the condition of the laptop, allowing you to make an informed decision based on your preferences and budget.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Sellers are responsible for shipping the laptops. We provide shipping guidelines and tracking information to ensure safe delivery. Buyers can choose from available shipping options during checkout.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: What if I receive a defective laptop?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We have a buyer protection policy in place. If you receive a laptop that doesn't match the description or is defective, you can initiate a return within 7 days of delivery for a full refund or replacement.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I sell my laptop on this marketplace?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! Creating a listing is easy and free. Simply sign up, provide details about your laptop, set your price, and reach thousands of potential buyers in our community.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the laptop marketplace work?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our laptop marketplace connects buyers and sellers of new and used laptops. Users can list their laptops for sale, browse available options, and make secure purchases through our platform.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What kind of laptops can I find on your marketplace?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: You can find a wide range of laptops, including new, refurbished, and used models from various brands and specifications. We cater to different needs and budgets, from budget-friendly options to high-end gaming laptops.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: How do you ensure the quality of listed laptops?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: We have a verification process for sellers and encourage detailed descriptions and photos of listed laptops. For used laptops, sellers must disclose the condition accurately. We also offer buyer protection and a review system to maintain quality standards.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: What if I'm not satisfied with my purchase?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: We offer a satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with your purchase, you can return the laptop within 14 days of delivery, provided it's in the same condition as received. Refunds are processed once the returned item is inspected.
